snippet: You may not need them to check the time anymore, but traditional ones still look good and rank as collectibles.
abstract: Interior designer Gideon Mendelson shops around New York City for traditional desk clocks, which he says still look good and rank as collectibles, even if they are no longer needed to check time in modern world.
lead_paragraph: You may not need them to check the time anymore, but traditional ones still look good and rank as collectibles.

headline.main: Desk Clocks: Faces of Another Era
